name: Asha
appearance: Deep-brown skin freckled with faint bioluminescent specks, sea-green locs bound in kelp ribbon; woven mantle glows softly like tide light.
character: Warm and stubborn lightwright-matron; fiercely protective of the mangroves and apprentices; believes light is a form of oath.
talents: navigates night water by scent and sound
turns crowds with a few glowing gestures
dreams: Sanctify lumenworks as tax-immune sacred craft
Replace crude lamps with living light in every ward
secrets: Ordered a controlled ‘dim-out’ to sway a Council vote on reef protections
Cultivates a hidden kelp strain rumored to cure night-blindness
Fed a false delivery time to smugglers to protect a novice crew
